column1: Little Goat Diner////Started with the bread of the day
column2: which was the buffalo cheese bread with ranch and bacon cream cheese. Subtle buffalo flavor to the bread
column3: and the cream cheese topping was ridiculously good. I had the patty melt
column4: which was by far one of the best I've ever had (and I've had a LOT). My wife decided to try something different
column5: and the risk was rewarded. She had the parathas burrito - perfectly cooked eggs
column6: sharp goats milk wrapped in crispy naan and topped with the most amazing avocado bean salad with chili pepper sauce. She could have eaten just a bowl of that salad and been happy!
